taxon.author: (Laxmann, 1770)
taxon.distribution: Central to eastern Europe, Turkey, Caucasus, Russia (Europe to South Siberia), Iran, Central Asia, China, Korea

referenceObject.reference: Laxmann, E. (1770). Novae insectorum species. Novi Commentarii Academiae Scientiarum Imperialis Petropolitanae 14: 593-604 (Araneae, p. 602).
